msContents.summary: Part of a roll. Contains a medical work focusing on the practical application of medicine and pharmacology against lung diseases.

msItem.note: This fragment does not come from the same roll as P. Lund. inv. 4 but is very close to it in chronology, style and contents
Publication status: Assigned to Isabella Andorlini, FacoltÄ di Lettere e Filosofia dell'UniversitÄ degli Studi di Parma, Parma, Italy

origin.origPlace: Tebtunis, Polemonos meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

provenance.p: Purchased in Berlin by Lund University Library in 1933, from prof. Carl Schmidt; Isabella Andorlini "Scavi e acquisti di papiri negli anni '30: il caso dei PLund" in Comunicazioni, Firenze 1995, Istituto papirologico G. Vitelli, p. 45-50

listBibl.bibl: Unpublished (Assigned Isabella Andorlini, Parma) but cf. P. Lund I 6, published by Albert Wifstrand, Literarische Fragmente, Aus der Papyrussammlung der UniversitÑtsbibliothek in Lund I, 1935, Kungl. humanistiska vetenskapssamfundets i Lund ÖrsberÑttelse and Isabella Andorlini, Trattato di medicina su papiro, Istituto papirologico G. Vitelli, Firenze 1995
